Text:
Sadly no "simple" English. If you install it as Hebrew or Arabic, your UI will be English, but I had problems opening files containing text in Photoshop because of the different text engine.

So I have to redownload a different release, but it sucks that I have to "waste" that much bandwidth because there are no useful nfo for the CS6 torrents.
RUSSIAN, ENGLISH (Hebrew or Arabic) FRANCIAS, POLISH, TURKISH, CZECH
LS6 edition: RUSSIAN, ENGLISH (Hebrew or Arabic) FRANCAIS, POLISH, TURKISH, CZECH
